reviewText:
Shaam (Shaam), Ehshaan (Arya), Pooja (Laila), Priya (Asin) and Irene (Pooja) are friends who gather for the wedding of Ehshaan.
The movie begins with a flashback, all recollecting their college days.
Ehshaan, a popular cricket player in the college falls in love with Irene, an Anglo-Indian. So does Shaam with Priya while Pooja develops a soft corner for Shaam.
